channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Don’t Believe the Biggest Myth About Heat Pumps
item.description: Not only do heat pumps work fine in cold weather, they’re still more efficient than gas furnaces in such conditions.

item.title: The 30 Best Movies on Hulu This Week (May 2024)
